headline: Dow Jones Factiva Surpasses 8,000 Licensed Sources for GenAI Use
summary: NEW YORK, January 20, 2026--Today, Dow Jones announced that Factiva, the trusted business intelligence platform and preeminent AI marketplace for publishers, has secured licensing rights from more than 8,000 premium news and business information sources for use in GenAI applications. This expansion reinforces Factiva’s leadership in providing high-quality, traceable and copyright-compliant content to power enterprise-level GenAI solutions, adding over 4,000 new licensed sources since the initial
